title: Animal Health (Designated Border Inspection Posts) Regulations, 2020
content:
27thOctober,2020 Statutory Instruments 533
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.87 OF2020
TheAnimal Health Act
(ActNo.27of2010)
The Animal Health (Designated Border Inspection Posts)
Regulations, 2020
INEXERCISEofthe powerscontainedinsection 2oftheAnimal
HealthAct,2010,thefollowingRegulationsaremade:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health Title
(DesignatedBorderInspectionPosts)Regulations,2020.
2. The border or point of entry set out in the Schedule are Designated
designatedasborderinspectionposts. border
inspection
posts
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
534 Statutory Instruments 27th October,2020

(Regulation2)
